Module Robotinterface
Package robotinterface.debug

Interface DebugPainter3D

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimDebugPainter3D
public interface DebugPainter3D
A DebugPainter allows a developer to draw output on a 3D map at runtime. The actual drawing is provided by DebugPainterOverlay3D. The developer first has to access an overlay and than can send drawing commands to this overlay. This appraoch is used to allow the user to select certain types of drawings from the overall set.
Author:
Jörg Roth (Joerg.Roth@Wireless-earth.org)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    DebugPainterOverlay3D getOverlay3D​(java.lang.String overlay)
    Get an instance for drawing.
    DebugPainterOverlay3D getOverlay3DByNumber​(int nr)
    Get an instance for drawing by number.

  • Method Details

    • getOverlay3D

      DebugPainterOverlay3D getOverlay3D​(java.lang.String overlay)
      Get an instance for drawing. The developer must define a name that is displayed in a selection box at runtime. The developer can use the same instance multiple times. Whenever the same overlay is used, this method returns the same instance.
      Parameters:
      overlay - overlay name
      Returns:
      overlay

    • getOverlay3DByNumber

      DebugPainterOverlay3D getOverlay3DByNumber​(int nr)
      Get an instance for drawing by number.
      Parameters:
      nr - overlay number
      Returns:
      overlay, null if number is out of range
